thread.title: Holidays from hell — we wish we weren’t here . . .
thread.title_full: Holidays from hell — we wish we weren’t here . . .

title: Holidays from hell — we wish we weren’t here . . .
text:
Google+ Published 1 minute ago A study has found that holidays leave many of us in a complete state of stress. Our writers recall that feeling 
Hugo Rifkind: ‘We were drunk, broke and still in the airport’ 
Fresh out of school, bored as hell, and inexplicably sneery about the public school cliché of going Interrailing, three friends and I found the cheapest last-minute package deal on Ceefax. Remember Ceefax? It was like the internet, but on televisions, and there were only four colours, and they had to make the pictures out of asterisks. No, I swear. 
Anyway, next to an asterisk picture of a palm tree, and at a cost of almost nothing, we had a week on the Greek island of Rhodes. 
One early problem
